ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:3}); // {Cloud}
A floating city
Pretty unsettling scenery.

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:9}); // {Cloud}
Then why doesn't everyone
move onto the Plate?

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:12}); // {Cloud}
I know
no one lives in the slums
because they want to.{PAUSE}It's like this train.
It can't run anywhere except
where its rails take it.

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:60}); // {Cloud}
So, what are we gonna do now?

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:66}); // {Cloud}
So what's our next target?

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:74}); // {Cloud}
What do we do until then?

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:76}); // {Cloud}
Sorry, but I have a thing against
sitting down in trains.

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:78}); // {Cloud}
What do we do after we jump?

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:2}); // {Barret}
Lookyou can see the surface now.
This city don't have no day or night.{PAUSE}If that plate weren't there
we could see the sky.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:47}); // This ain't no private car!!
So split up!!

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:51}); // {Barret}
Now look at that!!
It got empty alluva sudden.{PAUSE}What's goin' on?

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:94}); // {Barret}
Let's go!
Keep it up!

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:95}); // {Barret}
C'mon!! Hurry your slow ass up!
That's it, huh?

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:63}); // {Tifa}
What are you talking about?
Right about now, AVALANCHE is famous.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:65}); // {Tifa}
Looks like they just finished
connecting the cars.
We're finally leaving.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:69}); // {Tifa}
Which Shinra is very proud of.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:72}); // {Tifa}
That means we've got only three
more minutes to the ID Check point.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:83}); // {Tifa}
Oh, {Barret}!
Are you mad because
I'm not paying enough attention to you?

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:85}); // {Tifa}
{Cloud}, come over here!
Let's look at the Railway Map Monitor.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:86}); // {Tifa}
Hmm, it looks like
you've seen this already{PAUSE}It's all right. Come a little closer.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:87}); // {Tifa}
That's odd.
The ID Check Point was supposed
to be further down.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:88}); // Type A Security Alert!!{PAUSE}Unidentified passengers confirmed
A search of all cars will be conducted!

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:89}); // Repeat!!
Type A Security Alert!!{PAUSE}Unidentified passengers confirmed
A search of all cars will be conducted!

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:98}); // {Tifa}
We got a lot of battles ahead of us.
This's going to be tough.

ops.raw: a5 00 00 d0 ff 82 ff cb ff 2b 00

ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:26}); // Biggs
snoreheebeebeeheebeesnore
(Don't act so damn big,
{Barret}snooze)

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:25}); // Biggs
YAWNthat sure took its toll on me.
I'm gonna sleep till we get to the station.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:24}); // Biggs
This train hasn't switched
to security mode yet.{PAUSE}I'm sure that will change by tomorrow.

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:20}); // Jessie
We're almost there.
After talking with you,
I'm ready to try!{PAUSE}I think you've lit my fuse!

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:18}); // Jessie
Oh yeah, you might regret it.
I'm the type who takes things personal.

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:19}); // Jessie
Okay, then I'll put a little extra effort in
and make it with a BANG.

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:14}); // Jessie
Hey, {Cloud}.
You want to look at this with me?{PAUSE}It's a map of the Midgar Rail System.
Let's look at it together.
I'll explain it to you.

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:16}); // Jessie
I like this kinda stuff.
Bombs and monitorsyou know,
flashy stuff.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:21}); // Jessie
Speak of the devil{PAUSE}That light means that
we're in the ID Security Check area.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:22}); // whisperwhisper
(When the lights go off,
you never know what kind of
creeps'll come out.)

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:23}); // We're almost back now.
What a relief.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:92}); // Jessie
We're in trouble.{PAUSE}I'll explain later.
Hurry! Get to the next car!

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:31}); // Wedge
I'm seein' stars.
This sucks. I hate the dark.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:27}); // Wedge
Someday AVALANCHE's gonna be famous
and me, too!

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:29}); // Wedge
All my life, I felt like nothin' but a sidekick.{PAUSE}But, after joinin' AVALANCHE and
tryin' to save the Planet,
I feel like I can do lots of things.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:30}); // Wedge
Oh man,
that's pretty harsh. {Cloud}.
You really think I won't?

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:27}); // Wedge
Someday AVALANCHE's gonna be famous
and me, too!

ops.raw: a5 00 00 f3 ff 0c fe cb ff 35 00

ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:38}); // Please!!
Don't bother the other passengers.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:103}); // Shinra Manager
Waaaaah!!{PAUSE}Don'tdon't worry about me.
(oh man, oh man, oh man!!
I'm gonna brag to everyone
at work about this)

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:39}); // This is why I hate the last train.
Hoo-boy

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:48}); // Hoodlums again.
God, don't I just have all the luck?

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:53}); // It..it's empty because of
g, guys like you

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:55}); // Youyou've seen the news, right?
AVALANCHE says there'll be more bombings.{PAUSE}Only devoted employees like me
would go to Midgar on a day like today.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:57}); // Shinra Manager
I won't give in to violence
and I'm not giving you my seat either!

ops.raw: a5 00 00 c6 ff f7 00 cb ff 25 00

ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:45}); // You see the headlines in the Shinra Times?{PAUSE}The terrorists that bombed
the No. 1 Reactor are based
somewhere in the slums.{PAUSE}Blowing up a Reactor
they sure put some thought into this one.{PAUSE}They must have a real calculating leader.
I wonder what they'll do next?

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:102}); // If I die in the gutter,
use that to revive me, okay?

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:100}); // Hm?
You'd talk to me even now?{PAUSE}I'm really impressed.
Here's a little
something as a reward.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:99}); // Hmmm?
You're the only ones that'll talk to me
or come to my house.{PAUSE}I'm impressed.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:33}); // Huh?
This is my house,
so make yourselves at home.

dialogStrings: Last Train from Midgar
Inside Train

{Barret}
Lookyou can see the surface now.
This city don't have no day or night.{PAUSE}If that plate weren't there
we could see the sky.

{Cloud}
A floating city
Pretty unsettling scenery.

{Barret}
Huh?{PAUSE}Never expect ta hear that outta
someone like you.{PAUSE}You jus' full of surprises.

{Barret}
The upper worlda city on a plate{PAUSE}It's 'cuz of that &^#$# 'pizza'
that people underneath are sufferin'!

{Barret}
All the pollution from Mako energy above
falls down on the world below.

{Barret}
And the city below is full of polluted air.

{Barret}
On top'a that,
the Reactor keeps drainin' up
all the energy.

{Cloud}
Then why doesn't everyone
move onto the Plate?

{Barret}
Dunno.
Probably 'cuz they ain't got no money.
Or, maybe

'Cuz they love their land,
no matter how polluted it gets.

{Cloud}
I know
no one lives in the slums
because they want to.{PAUSE}It's like this train.
It can't run anywhere except
where its rails take it.

{Barret}
Stop actin' like a damn kid.
Siddown an' shu'up!

Jessie
Hey, {Cloud}.
You want to look at this with me?{PAUSE}It's a map of the Midgar Rail System.
Let's look at it together.
I'll explain it to you.
"To the Route Map Screen"

Jessie
I like this kinda stuff.
Bombs and monitorsyou know,
flashy stuff.

Jessie
I know!{PAUSE}Next time,
I'll make one just for you.
{CHOICE}Thanks anyway
{CHOICE}Looking forward to it

Jessie
Oh yeah, you might regret it.
I'm the type who takes things personal.

Jessie
Okay, then I'll put a little extra effort in
and make it with a BANG.

Jessie
We're almost there.
After talking with you,
I'm ready to try!{PAUSE}I think you've lit my fuse!

Jessie
Speak of the devil{PAUSE}That light means that
we're in the ID Security Check area.

whisperwhisper
(When the lights go off,
you never know what kind of
creeps'll come out.)

We're almost back now.
What a relief.

Biggs
This train hasn't switched
to security mode yet.{PAUSE}I'm sure that will change by tomorrow.

Biggs
YAWNthat sure took its toll on me.
I'm gonna sleep till we get to the station.

Biggs
snoreheebeebeeheebeesnore
(Don't act so damn big,
{Barret}snooze)

Wedge
Someday AVALANCHE's gonna be famous
and me, too!

Wedge
{Cloud}!!{PAUSE}Don't ya think I got a bright
future ahead of me?
{CHOICE}What do you have in mind?
{CHOICE}Don't hold your breath

Wedge
All my life, I felt like nothin' but a sidekick.{PAUSE}But, after joinin' AVALANCHE and
tryin' to save the Planet,
I feel like I can do lots of things.

Wedge
Oh man,
that's pretty harsh. {Cloud}.
You really think I won't?

Wedge
I'm seein' stars.
This sucks. I hate the dark.

Last train out of Sector 8 Station.
Last stop is Sector 7, Train Graveyard.
Expected time of arrival is 12:23AM,
Midgar Standard Time

Huh?
This is my house,
so make yourselves at home.

Hey!!
What's going on here?

Oops, uh,
n, nothing
Please don't make any trouble.

mumblegrumble
(Reactor's blown to bits
Bad things one after another
What a day!)

Please!!
Don't bother the other passengers.

This is why I hate the last train.
Hoo-boy

You see the headlines in the Shinra Times?{PAUSE}The terrorists that bombed
the No. 1 Reactor are based
somewhere in the slums.{PAUSE}Blowing up a Reactor
they sure put some thought into this one.{PAUSE}They must have a real calculating leader.
I wonder what they'll do next?

{Barret}
YO!

This ain't no private car!!
So split up!!

Hoodlums again.
God, don't I just have all the luck?

{Barret}
You say sumthin' ?

{Barret}
I said, 'you say sumthin'!?

{Barret}
Now look at that!!
It got empty alluva sudden.{PAUSE}What's goin' on?
DAMN!!

It..it's empty because of
g, guys like you
YYYYIPES!!

Youyou've seen the news, right?
AVALANCHE says there'll be more bombings.{PAUSE}Only devoted employees like me
would go to Midgar on a day like today.

{Barret}
You work for Shinra?

Shinra Manager
I won't give in to violence
and I'm not giving you my seat either!

{Tifa}
{Barret}!!

{Barret}
&$#%!!
You lucky ^$#^$.!

{Cloud}
So, what are we gonna do now?

{Barret}
@#$%! The hell you so calm?
You're bustin' up my rhythm!

{Barret}
Huh? Wait a minute!{PAUSE}Did we make a terrorist threat?

{Tifa}
What are you talking about?
Right about now, AVALANCHE is famous.

{Barret}
Heh heh
Famous

{Tifa}
Looks like they just finished
connecting the cars.
We're finally leaving.

{Cloud}
So what's our next target?

{Barret}
Hah! Listen to
Mr. Serious-about-his-work!

{Barret}
AlrightI'll tell ya!{PAUSE}Jessie's probably already told you,
but there's a security check point
at the top plate.{PAUSE}It's an ID scan system
checkin' all the trains.

{Tifa}
Which Shinra is very proud of.

{Barret}
We can't use our fake ID's
anymore

Good Morning, and welcome to Midgar lines.
Arrival time at Sector 4 Station is 11:45.

{Tifa}
That means we've got only three
more minutes to the ID Check point.

{Barret}
Alright, in three minutes,
we're jumpin' off this train.{PAUSE}Got it!?

{Cloud}
What do we do until then?

{Barret}
The hell do I care whatcha do?
Just siddown an' shu'up.

{Cloud}
Sorry, but I have a thing against
sitting down in trains.

{Barret}
@#$%! Do whatever you want!

{Cloud}
What do we do after we jump?

{Barret}
Yo, {Cloud}!

{Barret}
Yo, Mr. Know-it-all, big time SOLDIER!
You oughta know the area 'round
the No. 5 Reactor, right!{PAUSE}So let's hear YOUR explanation!

{Tifa}
I'll help, too.

{Barret}
@#$%!
I don't know even why you came!

{Tifa}
Oh, {Barret}!
Are you mad because
I'm not paying enough attention to you?

{Barret}
@#$%!!

{Tifa}
{Cloud}, come over here!
Let's look at the Railway Map Monitor.

{Tifa}
Hmm, it looks like
you've seen this already{PAUSE}It's all right. Come a little closer.

{Tifa}
That's odd.
The ID Check Point was supposed
to be further down.

Type A Security Alert!!{PAUSE}Unidentified passengers confirmed
A search of all cars will be conducted!

Repeat!!
Type A Security Alert!!{PAUSE}Unidentified passengers confirmed
A search of all cars will be conducted!

What's happening?

What's goin' on?!

Jessie
We're in trouble.{PAUSE}I'll explain later.
Hurry! Get to the next car!

{Barret}
@#$%!
Someone blew it

{Barret}
Let's go!
Keep it up!

{Tifa}
Oh well

Follow me!!
